Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”

Reviews.Content: hotel choice stay rome staff polite helpful answer museums etc breakfast fine example eggs yoghurt choco pops milk course tea coffe cleaning bathroom pleasant tip sit terrace topfloor wine eat prosciutto hotel situated square course traffic husband disturbed tram outside hotel termini metro walk 7 minutes metrostation rome stay

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous small hotel - excellent value”
Reviews.Author: JohnsonsGatwick
Reviews.Content: bit anxious approached hotel waiting catch wed deal photos looked amazing catch wasnt catch simply fabulous little gem heart rome offering excellent value money warm friendly atmosphere lovely modern fixtures fittings hotels huge plus 12 guests treated family reviews try objective cant fault hotel personal view bed little hard purely preference warning hotel located busy junction light sleepers benefit taking earplugs potential noise reason skip hotel selection accommodation rome hotel 15 20 minutes walk straight road cant lost termini main train station attractions easy walking distance definitely hopefully soon

Reviews.Title: “Weekend break in R ome”
Reviews.Author: paul h
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel friendly reception staff exceptionally clean continental breakfast hotel little saying walk colosseum 30 minutes metro station 5 mins trams busses stop round corner hotel 7am till deffinatley stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Long weekend before Xmas”
Reviews.Author: Alex218
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel short stay clean lovely terrace rooftop continental breakfast cooking nice cooked staff friendly helpful advice getting metro 10 minutes walk cheap tickets 1 euro single ticket valid 75 buses outside hotel colosseum walk 20 minutes receptionist move 4 star hotel springsummer 2012 disappointed sister hotel hotel dinner awful meal eat elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend”

Reviews.Content: hotel nice hotel soso neighborhood bit beaten path hotel nice staff helpful overall condition little shocked considered winter october air con shut metro half mile walk manzoni tram literally runs piazza porta maggiore 5 14 run termini figured day saved bit walking time bus 3 leaves outside pizza shop goes directly coloseum

Reviews.Title: “Loved the breakfest, very nice staff”
Reviews.Author: gilbr3
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights december rome alot fun hotel abit center enjoyed walks staff nice helpfull liked roof morning breakfest check weather except coffe dont serve hot cooked breakfest liked simple nice hotel nice clean bathroom shower tub tv channels english dont watching

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Courtney_Brown2388
Reviews.Content: found hotel via expedia looking visit rome 6 friends including boyfriend coming hotel slightly concerned regards reviews arrived ease couldn’t hotel exploring rome soon realised situated rome hotel perfect 5 minute walk metro trip rome 6 neither hotel staff help food lovely morning day due leave flight wasn’t 9pm sunday happy help luggage storage 6 people overall hotel recommend
